alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fallon and north central Carter Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Ekalaka, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, nickel size hail, and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Medicine Rocks State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
